TravelPace.ChatMessage.Title: Travel Pace Calculation
TravelPace.Effects.Fast: Fast pace imposes disadvantage on &Reference[Perception] or &Reference[Survival], and &Reference[Stealth] checks.
TravelPace.Effects.Normal: Normal pace imposes disadvantage on &Reference[Stealth] checks.
TravelPace.Effects.Slow: Slow pace grants advantage on &Reference[Perception] or &Reference[Survival] checks.
TravelPace.Errors.CalculationFailed: Failed to calculate travel results. Please check your inputs.
TravelPace.Errors.MessageCreationFailed: Failed to create chat message with travel results.
TravelPace.Errors.OpeningCalculator: There was an error opening the Travel Pace calculator.
TravelPace.Errors.SaveFailed: Failed to save mount configuration settings.
TravelPace.Preview.Title: Calculation Preview
TravelPace.Settings.EnabledMounts.Hint: Configure which actors can be used as mounts or vehicles in the calculator.
TravelPace.Settings.EnabledMounts.Name: Enabled Mounts & Vehicles
TravelPace.Settings.MountConfig.AddMount: To add mounts: create a folder called 'Mounts' and add actors that are type 'npc' or 'vehicle'. This folder is created automatically if it was deleted.
TravelPace.Settings.MountConfig.Hint: Select which actors should appear in the mount/vehicle dropdown.
TravelPace.Settings.MountConfig.Instruct: Select which actors should be available as mounts or vehicles in the travel pace calculator.
TravelPace.Settings.MountConfig.Label: Configure
TravelPace.Settings.MountConfig.Name: Configure Mounts & Vehicles
TravelPace.Settings.MountConfig.NoActors: No suitable actors found. Create NPC or vehicle type actors to use this feature.
TravelPace.Settings.MountConfig.NoMounts: No mounts or vehicles found in your world.
TravelPace.Settings.MountConfig.Title: Mount & Vehicle Configuration
TravelPace.Settings.ShowEffects.Hint: Display the game effects of each travel pace in chat messages.
TravelPace.Settings.ShowEffects.Name: Show Pace Effects in Chat
TravelPace.Settings.UseMetric.Hint: Use kilometers and meters instead of miles and feet.
TravelPace.Settings.UseMetric.Name: Use Metric System
TravelPace.Title: Travel Pace Calculator
TravelPace.Warnings.InvalidDistance: Distance provided was invalid, please see logs.
TravelPace.Warnings.InvalidTime: Time provided was invalid, please see logs.
